tool_description: Identifies and extracts person names, place names, dates, and other biographical entities from historical document text using NLP models trained on genealogical data.

text_content.description: Text content to extract entities from

document_type.description: Document type: birth_record, death_record, marriage_record, census, immigration, military, general

language.description: Document language for entity extraction optimization

include_relationships.description: Whether to identify family relationship terms

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence threshold for entity extraction (0.1-1.0)

region.description: Geographic region for name pattern recognition

custom_patterns.description: Custom regex patterns for specialized entity extraction

error_messages: Empty text input: Provide non-empty text_content for entity extraction
Invalid document_type: Use one of the supported document types
Invalid time_period: Use 18th_century, 19th_century, early_20th_century, or mid_20th_century
Invalid confidence_threshold: Must be number between 0.1 and 1.0
Custom pattern error: Custom patterns must be valid regex expressions
Entity extraction failed: Text may be too corrupted or contain no extractable entities
Language not supported: Specify a supported language code
usage: Input text content and specify document characteristics. Configure extraction parameters for optimal entity identification. Returns structured entities with confidence scores and locations.

entity_confidence.description: Confidence scores for each extracted entity

entity_positions.description: Start and end positions of entities in text
